title: Photos of the week
text:
Pictures | Fri Mar 2, 2018 | 10:10am EST Photos of the week 
White House Communications Director Hope Hicks leaves the U.S. Capitol after attending the House Intelligence Committee closed door meeting   Tuesday, February 27, 2018 White House Communications Director Hope Hicks leaves the U.S. Capitol after attending the House Intelligence Committee closed door meeting   1 / 20 
A young priest throws a snow ball during a heavy snowfall in Saint Peter's Square at the Vatican. REUTERS/Max Rossi Reuters / Monday, February 26, 2018 A young priest throws a snow ball during a heavy snowfall in Saint Peter's Square at the Vatican. REUTERS/Max Rossi Close 2 / 20 
  
Artists perform during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Christian Hartmann Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Artists perform during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Christian Hartmann Close 4 / 20 
A view shows an empty classroom at the school in Dapchi in the northeastern state of Yobe, where dozens of schoolgirls went missing after an attack on the village by Boko Haram, Nigeria. REUTERS/Afolabi Sotunde Reuters / Friday, February 23, 2018 A view shows an empty classroom at the school in Dapchi in the northeastern state of Yobe, where dozens of schoolgirls went missing after an attack on the village by Boko Haram, Nigeria. REUTERS/Afolabi Sotunde Close 5 / 20 
A Hindu devotee, smeared in coloured powder, takes a rest   coloured powder, takes a rest   6 / 20 
President Donald Trump holds his prepared questions as he hosts a listening session with high school students and teachers to discuss school safety at the White House. REUTERS/Jonathan Ernst Reuters / Wednesday, February 21, 2018 President Donald Trump holds his prepared questions as he hosts a listening session with high school students and teachers to discuss school safety at the White House. REUTERS/Jonathan Ernst Close 7 / 20 
French President Emmanuel Macron reacts as he takes part in a display of basketball skills during a visit to the Jesse Owens gymnasium in Villetaneuse, north of Paris. REUTERS/Ludovic Marin/Pool Reuters / Thursday, March 01, 2018 French President Emmanuel Macron reacts as he takes part in a display of basketball skills during a visit to the Jesse Owens gymnasium in Villetaneuse, north of Paris. REUTERS/Ludovic Marin/Pool Close 8 / 20 
Tourists from Poland float in the Dead Sea during sunset, near Metzoke Dragot in the Israeli occupied West Bank. REUTERS/Ronen Zvulun Reuters / Tuesday, February 27, 2018 Tourists from Poland float in the Dead Sea during sunset, near Metzoke Dragot in the Israeli occupied West Bank. REUTERS/Ronen Zvulun Close 9 / 20 
Participators wearing motorcycle helmet get sprayed by firecrackers, during the Beehive Firecrackers festival in   Participators wearing motorcycle helmet get sprayed by firecrackers, during the Beehive Firecrackers festival in Taiwan. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu Close 10 / 20 
A child and a man are seen at a hospital in the besieged town of Douma, Eastern Ghouta, Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Bassam Khabieh Reuters / Monday, February 26, 2018 A child and a man are seen at a hospital in the besieged town of Douma, Eastern Ghouta, Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Bassam Khabieh Close 11 / 20 
A guardsman sits on duty in the snow at Horse Guards Parade in London. REUTERS/Peter Nicholls Reuters / Wednesday, February 28, 2018 A guardsman sits on duty in the snow at Horse Guards Parade in London. REUTERS/Peter Nicholls Close 12 / 20 
A wounded Congolese soldier from the Armed Forces of the Democratic Republic of Congo (FARDC) is carried by another soldier in the forest after the army took control of a ADF rebel camp, near the town of Kimbau, North Kivu Province, Democratic... more Reuters / Friday, February 23, 2018 A wounded Congolese soldier from the Armed Forces of the Democratic Republic of Congo (FARDC) is carried by another soldier in the forest after the army took control of a ADF rebel camp, near the town of Kimbau, North Kivu Province, Democratic Republic of Congo. REUTERS/Goran Tomasevic Close 13 / 20 
A woman villager cleans garbage in front of her house as flood hits Tanjungsari village in Tasikmalaya, Indonesia. Antara Foto/Adeng Bustomi/ via REUTERS Reuters / Friday, February 23, 2018 A woman villager cleans garbage in front of her house as flood hits Tanjungsari village in Tasikmalaya, Indonesia. Antara Foto/Adeng Bustomi/ via REUTERS Close 14 / 20 
An armed forces member patrols during an operation against drug dealers in Vila Alianca slum, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. REUTERS/Ricardo Moraes Reuters / Tuesday, February 27, 2018 An armed forces member patrols during an operation against drug dealers in Vila Alianca slum, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. REUTERS/Ricardo Moraes Close 
Smoke rises from the besieged Eastern Ghouta in Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/ Bassam Khabieh Reuters / Tuesday, February 27, 2018 Smoke rises from the besieged Eastern Ghouta in Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/ Bassam Khabieh Close 16 / 20 
Models present creations by designer Maria Grazia Chiuri as part of her Autumn/Winter 2018-2019 women's ready-to-wear collection show for fashion house Dior during Fashion Week in Paris. REUTERS/Pascal Rossignol Reuters / Tuesday, February 27, 2018 Models present creations by designer Maria Grazia Chiuri as part of her Autumn/Winter 2018-2019 women's ready-to-wear collection show for fashion house Dior during Fashion Week in Paris. REUTERS/Pascal Rossignol Close 
A horse stands in a snow covered field in Keele, Newcastle-under-Lyme, Britain. REUTERS/Carl Recine Reuters / Tuesday, February 27, 2018 A horse stands in a snow covered field in Keele, Newcastle-under-Lyme, Britain. REUTERS/Carl Recine Close 18 / 20 
An injured boy cries as he flees an area where air strikes hit a house in Saada, Yemen. REUTERS/Naif Rahma Reuters / Tuesday, February 27, 2018 An injured boy cries as he flees an area where air strikes hit a house in Saada, Yemen. REUTERS/Naif Rahma Close 19 / 20 
A widow daubed in colours takes part in Holi celebrations in the town of Vrindavan in the northern state of Uttar Pradesh, India. REUTERS/Adnan Abidi Reuters / Wednesday, February 28, 2018 A widow daubed in colours takes part in Holi celebrations in the town of Vrindavan in the northern state of Uttar Pradesh, India. REUTERS/Adnan Abidi Close
